resources.string: This App is in development mode...so do not perform any transaction...if you want to donate or support developers then only proceed...but you will not receive any thing in return
This application will help our environment by cutting down on the amount of various in-organic waste.
The working procedure is simple yet effective. There are two accounts one for business purpose and another one for the user or buyer purpose .
User can sell recyclable wastes in this application and buy recycled products . The sold waste will be recycled and user seller can sell those in this platform as the buyer can by those.

Thus the waste products will be recycled and can be used again serving many purposes. This cycle will help us to reduce the amount of in-organic and recyclable wastes and will help our environment to become pollution free.
The team which tried their very best to make the application:-
** Your one opinion will case one improvement. So please take your time and don\'t forget to give us your valuable feedback.**
We appreciate your interest in providing us with your valuable Insights. !!!!
** In oder to make your feedback form successfully sent to us please ensure you use the following e-mail address as receiver. **
